overview: Ripped muscle guys, hairy hunks and sex-crazed studs make this adventure into orgy madness a scorching indulgence from start to finish. Big dicks slam into eager butt holes, begging for a hard ramming as their throats are ploughed by yet another hunk. Scenes included are from Out in the Open, Out on the Con, Out on Vacation, Out on Parole, and Out on the Farm. Drenched in spunk, these men know exactly what they want!
title: Out on the Orgy
